Interests

Design and Development

I have always had a passion for creativity and self-expression, which led me to start painting at a young age. As I grew older, my interests expanded to include the digital world, and I began exploring web development as a means of harnessing my creativity in new and exciting ways. While the mediums may be different, the drive to create and express myself through art has remained a constant source of inspiration and motivation for me. Whether I am working on a new website or creating a painting, I always strive to bring my unique perspective and creative vision to the task at hand.

Photography

As I journeyed to new and exciting destinations, I found myself increasingly drawn to capturing the beauty and diversity of the world through the lens of my camera. It allows me to explore my creativity in new ways, and the process of developing my own photos has been a rewarding and fulfilling experience. With every click of the shutter, I strive to capture the unique spirit and essence of the places I visit and the people I meet."

Computational Chemistry

The field of chemistry is rapidly evolving, with an increasing focus on data-driven and computational approaches to research. My research is dedicated to exploring the intricate details of molecular interactions, using a variety of computational methods such as molecular docking and machine learning to predict these interactions.
